response.original_title: The Best of the Lassie Show
response.overview: Easily one of television's most iconic and enduring characters, Lassie the remarkably intelligent collie has captured the imaginations of families for decades with her exciting canine adventures and consistent last-minute heroics. This compilation from the long-running series includes the episodes "The Rocking Chair," "Lassie at the Grand Canyon" and "Peace Patrol," in which Lassie crosses paths with another iconic TV character, the Lone Ranger.
response.title: The Best of the Lassie Show
